name: Original Artist Info Popup
description:
Don't like changes? Then this might be for you!
Bringing the original artist popup back when you hover over their names.

Current version: 1.3
additional_info:
Features:
- Artist avatar fills info background
- Removed location info

Bugs:
- Because of how this CSS is designed, people with really long usernames will push the follow button down

March 13 V1.3:
-Removed hover color over followers
-Removed a invisible link square over info

March 12 V1.2:
-Changed background color of user info from grey to black

March 10 V1.1:
-Removed square appearing infront of name/followers
